name: yoga
description: The Yoga Enrollment App simplifies the process of enrolling in monthly yoga classes. This application features a React-based frontend and a Node.js/Express backend. Users can seamlessly fill out enrollment forms and choose preferred batches for yoga sessions.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i" "npm i"
